findings.title: Missing balance reset in refund function
findings.explanation: The refund() function transfers the user's entire balance but never updates balances[msg.sender] back to zero. This allows a user to repeatedly call refund() and drain the contract's funds.
findings.fix_suggestion: After transferring the balance, set balances[msg.sender] = 0 (ideally before the external call) to prevent repeated withdrawals.
